long_description: When your zipper pull breaks, replace it with the Ergo Zipper Pull by Gear Aid. Ergonomically designed, it's not only reliable, but also comfortable to use. The Gear Aid Zipper Pull provides up to 80 lbs. of pulling strength so it will likely never break again. Includes 2 zipper pulls.
short_description: When your zipper pull breaks, replace it with the Ergo Zipper Pull by Gear Aid. Ergonomically designed, it's not only reliable, but also comfortable to use.
